title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
author: Brandon Sanderson
blurb: A heist thriller with a hard magic system where people gain superpowers by eating specific metals.

title: The War of Art
author: Steven Pressfield
blurb: Claims that the hardest part of the creative process is consistently creating. Then it goes way off the rails and claims writing can cure cancer...

title: On Writing: A Memoir Of The Craft
author: Stephen King
blurb: 1 part biography, 1 part treatise on the craft of writing. Full of interesting stories and great advice.

title: Structuring Your Novel
author: K.M. Weiland
blurb: A useful overview of the various structural elements most stories have.
